name: Ferocity
baseDescription: Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by 1 Rage or Energy.

name: Feral Aggression
baseDescription: Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by 8% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by 3%.

name: Feral Instinct
baseDescription: Increases threat caused in Bear and Dire Bear Form by 3% and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling.

name: Brutal Impact
baseDescription: Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by 0.5 sec.

name: Thick Hide
baseDescription: Increases your Armor contribution from items by 2%.

name: Feline Swiftness
baseDescription: Increases your movement speed by 15% while outdoors in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge while in Cat Form by 2%.

name: Feral Charge
baseDescription: Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 sec.

name: Sharpened Claws
baseDescription: Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by 2%.

name: Improved Shred
baseDescription: Reduces the Energy cost of your Shred ability by 6.

name: Predatory Strikes
baseDescription: Increases your melee attack power in Cat, Bear and Dire Bear Forms by 100% of your level.

name: Blood Frenzy
baseDescription: Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points  have a 50% chance to add an additional combo point.

name: Primal Fury
baseDescription: Gives you a 50% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form.

name: Savage Fury
baseDescription: Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 10%.

name: Faerie Fire (Feral)
baseDescription: Decrease the armor of the target by 175 for 40 sec.  While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.

name: Heart of the Wild
baseDescription: Increases your Intellect by 4%.  In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 4% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by 4%.

name: Leader of the Pack
baseDescription: While in Cat, Bear or Dire Bear Form, the Leader of the Pack increases ranged and melee critical chance of all party members within 45 yards by 3%.
